ROOT.GetRailwayInfo: select W.RAILWAY_NAME,S.CHARGINGLINEID1,S.CHARGINGLINEID2 from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_STATION_R_RAILWAY W LEFT JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_RAILWAY_STATION S ON W.STATION_ID=S.STATION_ID WHERE W.RAILWAY_NAME LIKE '%{0}%' ORDER BY RAILWAY_NAME
ROOT.GetRecentStationWeatherInfo: SELECT C.STATION_ID,WEATHER_CONDITION_RESULT,HUMIDITY,TEMPERATURE,CREATETIME,WIND_DIR_RESULT,WIND_LEVEL_RESULT,WINDSPEED,PRESSURE,RAIN,CLOUD,WIND_DIRECTION FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_WEATHER_REAL_INFO A JOIN ( select WEATHER_SOURCE_ID,MAX(CREATETIME) AS TM from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_WEATHER_REAL_INFO WHERE CREATETIME<{0} GROUP BY WEATHER_SOURCE_ID ) B ON A.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID=B.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID AND A.CREATETIME=B.TM JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_STATION_WEATHERSOURCE C ON A.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID=C.WEATHER_SOURCE_ID WHERE C.STATION_ID IN ({1})
ROOT.GetRailwayLines: SELECT RAILWAY_NAME,TRAFFIC_PROPERTY,STATION_NAME,STATION_CITY,QYZ,QYZ_VOLTAGE,QYZID,B.LONGITUDE ,B.LATITUDE FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_RAILWAY_STATION_SUPPLY A LEFT JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_RAILWAY_STATION B ON A.STATION_NAME=B.STATIONNAME WHERE RAILWAY_NAME LIKE '%{0}%' OR STATION_NAME LIKE '%{0}%'
